alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 18 at 3:32PM EST until December 19 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Coastal Jefferson, Coastal Wakulla and Coastal Taylor Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 8 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla
